attributes.action: Allow officers to search known offenders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment Police officers need reasonable grounds to stop and search people of an offence. Or for a section 60 search a officer of rank needs to aurthorise it.
If people are known to the Police to be committing offences are are part of a gang then officers should be able to target these people. At the moment officers are not searching people who need searching as they are worried there are not enough grounds when speaking to them.
